extendedInfo.description: Size doesn't matter to these miniature men of war.Take control of a petite platoon of crack soldiers in a variety of wee warzones as you battle through an epic third-person-shooter campaign. Military-grade strategy, intense shooter action, outstanding 3D visuals and a wry smile make Tiny Troopers an unmissable combination of manic combat, monumental mirth and miniature marines.**Runs beautifully on tablets**WAR! HUH. WHAT IS IT GOOD FOR?Absolutely everything! Featuring awesome visuals, intuitive touch-controlled gameplay, varied missions and a great sense of humor, Tiny Troopers is the complete combat package. ENGAGE THE ENEMYYou control three highly trained tiny troopers on wild, exciting missions to take out the enemy, blow up structures, and escort civilians through war-torn battlegrounds. Your undersized infantry is on the frontline, and itâs up to you to make sure they win big.WHAT'S THE MISSION?Tiny Troopers features 30 explosive missions spread across three chapters, all tied together to deliver an involving, narrative-driven campaign. Take part in the small soldiersâ story as you attempt to crush the biggest enemy youâve ever faced.GET PROMOTEDYour troops will get stronger and more battle-hardened the more missions they survive. Upgrade your wee warriorsâ weaponry as you complete missions and earn big rewards. Can you keep your small squad alive through the whole war? Work your way up the reduced-sized ranks and find out in Tiny Troopers!There is a known issue with the remove ads button not doing anything. An update will resolve this shortly.For more information or support, please visit www.chillingo.com

reviews.title: Game works great
reviews.comment: Very very addictive, although i tried in app purchases but for some odd reason i haven\'t been able to. I am able to buy other things on the playstore. So i know it\'s not me if the game itself. Please fix, I was also charged 3 times! It has been a hassle trying to find answers on getting my refund.
reviews.author: Nando M

reviews.title: looks good...
reviews.comment: Game looks awesome but it wont respond. Tried the tutorial and hot second waypoint and guy just ran into a wall. Fix and i will reinstall. Using htc my touch
reviews.author: Kamron Hall

reviews.title: Fucked
reviews.comment: Game will freeze up and your men will still be shot down. Just lost two captains I had since I first downloaded the game.
reviews.author: Diego Casillas

reviews.title: Holy Lag...
reviews.comment: This game is great...when it doesn\'t lag up. Developers really need to fix this issue. I can\'t get passed the first chapter bc it also crashes during the little cut scene. Idk how many error reports I\'ve sent Google but something has to be done. Its a shame to let such a nice game like this go to sh!t
reviews.author: Sean Goldrick

reviews.title: David
reviews.comment: I really like the game, unfortunately have issues with it as well. Seems on every other level there is a lag in the level. Whether it be a stream or a road, it just looks like someone rubbed there finger there the art before it dried. Can play thru but just annoying. I even bought the game. Buying doesn\'t stop the adds as advertised either. Still asks me if I want to get rid of them but then tells me I already own them. Such a shame the game is fun. Trued uninstalling and reinstalling, no go
reviews.author: David Hoinoski

reviews.title: Awesome but it needs fixing and mabey some new stuff
reviews.comment: Whenever I go in water its just like everything just befor the water IS the water cuz I don\'t think water is supposed to look like a buncha tanks or crosshairs for using weapons so.....fix it plz I have a Samsung galaxy s3. Other then that its a epic game hope to see more mabey add guns you can buy for each individual soldier to use for the Whole game like a sniper rifle or a mini gun or mabey even  a FLAME THROWER if you wanna be crazy. :-)
reviews.author: Will Ortiz

reviews.title: Better on iPhone
reviews.comment: I love my android, but this game is ten times better on an iPhone. The responsiveness really sucks!
reviews.author: Igor Janev

reviews.title: GAME SUCKS
reviews.comment: This game erased all my data for it once I died cause of lag it sucks poor quality and over all if I could I would give it -10 stars I will tell everyone never to use this DONT USE THIS APP IT SUCKS SUCKS UN INSTALLIT CAUSE ITS RUBISH AND GARBAGE
reviews.author: Roman Mahi

reviews.title: Excellent game ... except in-app Purchases
reviews.comment: Rookie Pack froze the game and never appeared, but I did get charged twice. Interestingly also EA does not have Tiny Troopers on their site in the list of games - so you cannot even select it for support.   I want my $1.98 back please.  ............outside of this \"taking my money\" issue - this is an awesome game [Nexus 7]
reviews.author: Vadim Shelkovnikov

reviews.title: Never purchase this app
reviews.comment: I paid get extra items and remove the ads. They charged me the price of the app and the extra items. However, the ads did not disappear and the app did not update my storage with the extra items. There purchase system is very poor.
reviews.author: Sherif Saad

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Force closes after beating levels too often for me to continue playing continuously. Good job tho when it works.
reviews.author: Phillip Simmons

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: This is an awesome game !! keeps me busy, though it would be great if you add more units, there is not that many and more options of missiles or guns
reviews.author: Marcos Morales

reviews.title: Only bad thing
reviews.comment: The Will freeze for like 10seconds and only my guys won\'t move so i die all the time
reviews.author: richard laporte

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I like the games is awsome i only got one problems it keeps going slow needs fixing but awsome game
reviews.author: Jesus Gonzalez

reviews.title: I\'m surprised.
reviews.comment: I must say, I was a bit apprehensive about what this game would play like but that\'s all in the past. I absolutely love this game. The graphics rock and the missions are extremely fun to play. I\'ve even made multiple in-game purchases and they\'ve all showed up instantly. Great game guys!! Thank you.
reviews.author: Jeff Jones

reviews.title: Not responding
reviews.comment: The game is lots of fun but is slow to respond to commands or doesn\'t respond at all. I have to keep force closing. Could be 5 stars if all the bugs are fixed.
reviews.author: Keith Morgan

reviews.title: But
reviews.comment: It was cool but every time.i try to tap/command theres a long delay and im getting killed during the mission, please fix tap delays please
reviews.author: Juhmal Howell

reviews.title: Great, but where\'s Tiny Troopers 2 !!!!
reviews.comment: I like this game on iOS but hate it on the iPhone\'s tiny 3.5\" screen. now I can play it in all its glory on the beautiful Super Amoled HD display on my Galaxy Note !!  Ive waited patiently for it and it has finally arrived on Android !!!  update:  Tiny Troopers 2 is now available in the App Store, so how long we Android users gotta wait for it?!?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: in_app purchase never showed up
reviews.comment: i bought a rookie pack and the game froze for two hours right after the purchase. i had to restart my device and my purchased pack never showed up in my game. could you please pleaseplease refund me my payment?
reviews.author: Feng Liu

reviews.title: great game
reviews.comment: good visuals nice picture grab it now!
reviews.author: Aries White
